src:
Laciju ceo plen na San Siru, remi u Firenci
03 Nov 2019, 23:20 by Zile
Zanimljivo je bilo u Firenci i Milanu, na dve poslednje nedeljne utakmice Serije A.
Lacio je do treće uzastopne pobede u Seriji A stigao na gostovanju kod Milana. Gosti su na San Siru poveli u 25. minutu kada je Lazari sa desne strane pogodio u glavu Imobilea, a najbolji strelac lige glavom poslo loptu u mrežu. Samo tri minuta kasnije domaćin je izjednačio. Spretno je reagovao Pjontek, nekako je dohvatio loptu, ona je pogodila u grudi Bastosa i prevarila Strakošu.
Malo je prilika viđeno u nastavku, sve je mirisalo na remi, a onda je „sevnula“ kontra Rimljana. Igrao se 83. minut, Luis Alberto je pravovremeno proigrao Hoakina Koreu, a ovaj pogodio za pobedu gostiju. Sergej Milinković-Savić je igrao do 60. minuta.
Fiorentina ponovo nije pobedila na svom „Artemio Franakiju“. Bod je iz Firence odnela Parma, a „viola“ ostaje u sredini tabele Serije A. Gosti su poveli golom Žervinja, koga je odlično proigrao Kucka, u 40. minutu. Sve do 67. minuta Parma je održavala vođstvo, a tada je Kastrovili, posle centaršuta Dalberta, glavom zakucao loptu u mrežu. U timu Fiorentine nije bilo suspendovanog Riberija, ali je igrao srpski dvojac. Nikola Milenković je odigrao svih 90 minuta, dok je Dušan Vlahović šansu dobio u 55. minutu.
Fiorentina – Parma 1:1(0:1)Kastrovili 67′ – Žervinjo 40′
Milan – Lacio 1:2(1:1)Bastos 28′(ag) – Imobile 25′, Korea 83′

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Lazio all the booty on San Siro, a draw in Florence
03 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Zile
It has been interesting in Florence and Milan, in the last two weekly Serie A games.
Lazio made it to Milan for the third consecutive Serie A victory. The visitors took the lead in San Siro in the 25th minute when Lazari on the right hit Imobile's head and the league's top scorer sent the ball into the net. Just three minutes later the home side equalized. Pjontek reacted deftly, somehow retrieving the ball, she hit in the chest of Bastos and tricked Strakosha.
Not many opportunities were seen below, it all smelled of rhyme, and then it "radiated" against the Romans. Playing in the 83rd minute, Luis Alberto duly played Hoakin Korea, and this one scored to win the visitors. Sergej Milinkovic-Savic played until the 60th minute.
Fiorentina did not win her Artemio Franaki again. The score was taken from Florence by Florence, and the "viola" remains in the middle of the Serie A table. Until the 67th minute Parma maintained the lead, and then Kastrovili, after a Dalbert midfield, threw his head into the net. The Fiorentine team had no suspended Riberi, but the Serbian duo played. Nikola Milenkovic played all 90 minutes, while Dušan Vlahović got his chance in the 55th minute.
Fiorentina - Parma 1: 1 (0: 1) Castrovilli 67 ′ - Gervinho 40 ′
Milan - Lazio 1: 2 (1: 1) Bastos 28 ′ (ag) - Imobile 25 ′, Korea 83 ′
